founderNote.title: From Peter Pitcher
founderNote.content: I've been where you are. Staring at empty tables, wondering how to pay next week's bills, considering if it's time to give up. The Anchor nearly broke us. But we figured it out, and now I want to help you do the same. No corporate BS, no theory - just what actually works.

faqs.question: How quickly can you help me?
faqs.answer: I can usually respond within 2 hours during the day. We'll have an initial chat, and I can often provide immediate actions you can implement that same day. Full transformation plans typically start within 48 hours of our first conversation.

faqs.question: What if I can't afford help right now?
faqs.answer: I understand - cash flow is tight. That's why I charge hourly (¬£75) rather than huge upfront fees. Start with just 2-3 hours of help for quick wins. Most pubs make back their investment within the first weekend through increased sales.

faqs.question: Do you work with all types of pubs?
faqs.answer: Yes - from traditional locals to gastropubs, sports bars to country inns. The principles are the same: fill seats, increase spend, reduce costs, save time. I adapt strategies to your specific pub type and customer base.

faqs.question: What makes you different from other consultants?
faqs.answer: I actually run a pub. Every strategy I recommend has been tested at The Anchor first. I'm not a consultant who's never pulled a pint - I'm dealing with the same challenges you are, every single day.

faqs.question: What if your strategies don't work for my pub?
faqs.answer: That's why I stay closely involved during the first month. We review progress every week, adjust fast, and keep at it until the numbers move. These strategies transformed The Anchor and dozens of other pubs, and I'll stick with you to make sure they do the same for yours.
